Collection order made. Make payments as ordered.

judicialResults.label: Discretionary with ordinary disqualification
judicialResults.resultText:
DDD - Discretionary with ordinary disqualification
Disqualified for holding or obtaining a driving licence for 12 Months.  Discretionary disqualification. Driving record endorsed. Section 34(2) Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.
